Title: An Act Changing the Name of the Southern Leyte Agro-Fisheries Technical Institute in the Municipality of Bontoc, Province of Southern Leyte, to Ruperto K. Kangleon Memorial Agro-Fisheries Technical Institute
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 888
An Act Changing the Name of the Southern Leyte Agro-Fisheries Technical Institute in the Municipality of Bontoc, Province of Southern Leyte, to Ruperto K. Kangleon Memorial Agro-Fisheries Technical Institute
Section 1. The name of the Southern Leyte Agro-Fisheries Technical Institute in the Municipality of Bontoc, Province of Southern Leyte, is changed to Ruperto K. Kangleon Memorial Agro-Fisheries Technical Institute.
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.1Ã¢wphi1
Approved: December 3, 1985
